roleset.name: to imply or predicate

example.name: connote-v: transitive
example.text: The name is supposed to connote feminine grandeur , but in Japanese it means `` eyeglasses . ''

example.name: connotation-n
example.text: who eventually could n't help but admit that the CCTV building has sexual connotations in its design consisting of a buttocks and a penis after he got a huge design fee and the Chinese party got a huge kickback , very disgusting .

propbank.arg: consisting of a buttocks and a penis

roleset.note: CONNOTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'connote' based on WSJ; nominal 'connotation' based on BOLT-7. (from connote.01-v)
CONNOTATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from connotation.01-n)
